div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: During a press conference held today. Governor Sisolak announced the closure of all schools in Nevada effective tomorrow, Monday March 16th. As a result, all students are to remain home. Staff will be asked to stay home tomorrow unless contacted. Administration will contact staff to schedule meetings to coordinate preparations for the school closure. Please note this is an involving situation and we will continue to provide updates on our website. Thank you for your understanding and support of our students.
